instructions: Back up all data on the internal memory. From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap Settings . Tap Back up and reset . If desired, tap Automatic restore to clear the check box. If desired, tap Back up my data to clear the check box. Tap Factory data reset . Tap Reset device . If you have screen lock turned on, enter your PIN or password. Tap Continue . Tap Delete all .
From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap Settings . Tap Application manager . If necessary, swipe right to the Downloaded screen. Tap the desired application. Tap Uninstall and then tap OK .
Press and hold the Power key. Tap Restart . Tap OK .
